<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_616811_coworking_csr_reservations</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Alert Users How Much Rent Reserved</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
// 	var diff = getValue(u_start_time) - getValue(u_end_time); //differece between start and end
// 	var total = getValue(rent) * diff; //multiplication between rent and total of diff
// 	//gs.print(rent.getDisplayValue());
// 	//alert("You have rent reservation of"+total.getDisplayValue());
// 	gs.addInfoMessage("You have rent reservation of"+total.getDisplayValue());
	
	var gdt1 = new GlideDateTime(" "+getValue(u_start_time));
	var gdt2 = new GlideDateTime(" "+getValue(u_end_date));
 
	var dur = GlideDateTime.subtract(gdt1, gdt2); //the difference between gdt1 and gdt2
	alert(dur.getDisplayValue());
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-15 05:36:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>766c09fc97160110002ffef3a253aff5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Alert Users How Much Rent Reserved</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_766c09fc97160110002ffef3a253aff5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-15 07:43:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=766c09fc97160110002ffef3a253aff5"/></record_update>
